name: Dark Age: Chronicles of Otia (Ver 0.1)
description:
Dark Age: Chronicles of Otia is a Strategy Role-Playing game in a similar vein to the much more popular Fire Emblem game series by Nintendo. In this game, you take control over a growing revolutionary force that’s attempting to restore a fallen kingdom and regain its lost prosperity. Meanwhile, the rest of the continent is on the verge of a full-scale war, as the Holy Empire of Zion rallies its vast armies at every border, ready to conquer all of Otia!

FEATURES:

-A combat system that incorporates strategy and role-playing elements!

-A tile-based map system that grants both players and enemies advantage (or disadvantage) in combat!

-The potential to explore the entire continent of Otia, discovering secrets and completing quests along the way!

-30+ playable characters—each with their own unique personality and background!

-20+ different unit class trees, each with their own set of weapons, skills, techniques, and/or magick!

-5+ playable races, including Human, Dragonfolk, Elf, Faefolk, and Giantfolk!

-A zodiac system based on the Major Arcana tarot cards, which determines each character’s set of learned skills!

Any feedback is appreciated!
